name: Villain REWIND
description:
Villain REWIND

[=============================================================]

Submitted to Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

[=============================================================]

Challenge yourself with this 3D platformer themed around the word REWIND. Beat the Villain REWIND over and over with a dynamically changing level based off of your previous paths. I'll give you a slight advantage! A disable-gun able to disable any traps with a slow recharge. Good luck. Try Easy, Medium, Hard or even possibly Impossible mode!

[=============================================================]

     You were just able to get past all the previous rooms with your life! You had to stop Villain REWIND before he obtains the time crystals, but it seems it's too late! You now must repeat the same room over and over, rewinding each time. Only problem is, you're in his domain now. He can shape the room to whatever he wishes. With the knowledge of your previous moves, this can't be good. He aims to build a bomb strong enough to destroy the world. You must stop him in the times that remain!

[=============================================================]

Controls:

WASDMoveMouseViewShiftSlideSpaceJumpLeft-ClickShoot Disability-PelletEscapePause
